title: Are custom skins allowed?
body: I want to know if it is allowed or not

replies.body: A popular question!  Custom skins isn't something we're banning for right now, but that can always change.  Check out our [stance on third parties](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and be super wary.  We can't support you if you run into any issues, or find malicious content hiding within those mods.  Be careful!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JQuzGWZv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-03T23:40:23.178+0000)
>
> A popular question!  Custom skins isn't something we're banning for right now, but that can always change.  Check out our [stance on third parties](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and be super wary.  We can't support you if you run into any issues, or find malicious content hiding within those mods.  Be careful!

You guys recently released a statement where you will be changing the way skins and custom skins would operate. Specifically, it would involve far more manipulation of game files and outside-the-game files to get custom skins. Do you know if custom skins will continue to be something that you won't ban once that change happens?
If any 3rd party modification is only cosmetic in nature (champ/map skins, voice packs), it's fine. I use Wooxy to help install Rick & Morty announcer and some map skins.
